usg: Use to set a value for the element.

button.desc: the value will be sent to the server if the button is used to submit the form.

input.desc:
it is used differently depends on the type of it.

For "button", "reset", "submit", "text", "password", and "hidden"- it defines the text on the control.br>
For "checkbox", "radio" used to set as value of selection.

It cannot be used with the type "file".

option.desc: its value text is send to the server. If not set its content send as value to the server.

param.desc: it used as value of the parameter of the plugin with name attribute value.
